metadata.title: CVE-2017-13710 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The setup_group function in elf.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD)library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference andapplication crash) via a group section that is too small.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
